body:
Comment 5 by **dustyisawilson**: 
I don't want every error to be enumerated.  I want Windows and non-Windows to both
return a net.DNSError instead of a different type just because it's in Windows.  Unless
you think you're going to get something that isn't legitimately a DNSError?  What other
errors would ever come out of this that isn't a DNS error?
